title: feat(dashboard): add model usage by tier panels
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Tracking the nectar
gist.blurb: We've updated our internal dashboards to see exactly which models our Spores, Seeds, and Flowers love the most.
gist.summary: Added detailed 'Model Usage by Tier' panels to the internal economics dashboard to track consumption patterns across all user levels.
gist.impact: Enables better data-driven decisions about model availability and tier benefits.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee analyzing a data board. The board displays the tier symbols: a mushroom (Spore), a seedling (Seed), a flower (Flower), and a honey pot (Nectar), each with a pixelated bar chart next to it. The scene is a cozy, warm control room or study.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee studying a large pixelated chart showing growth stats for mushrooms, seeds, and flowers. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi study vibes. Cute pixel icons of tier symbols on the chart. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot analyzing colorful bar charts on a retro computer monitor. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Pixel icons of flowers and seeds on the screen. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Nostalgic but beautiful.
